extendedInfo.description: Ever repented for talking 1 minute 1 second / 2m 1s/3m 1s (a few seconds more than a minute)Shocked to see your heavy phone bills?This app will rescue you!Purpose - To save your money by helping you save call minutes.A minute saved is a minute earned. During OUTGOING call the app beeps at the end of every minute & beeps twice at the end of 5 minutes. Its our way of telling you "Enough! You are burning away your call minutes / balance/ money speedily! "It has two modes Periodic mode - Beep at the end of every minuteOne time mode - Beeps only once at during the whole call at a preset timeAs much as this is a money saving app, this is a rescue app too. Here is how.1. Talking too much on phone slowly damages your ears. (Because of continuous echo)2 Time wastage minute by minute3. Less actual, face to face contact4. Money wastage. 5. Sometimes we end up telling something we do not intend to. It leads to many complicated issues.SO SAVE YOUR MONEY! SAVE YOURSELF!

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This app is useless, starts counting at some point that has nothing to do with anything and beeps too loud...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: this is really simple to use app, but...: - beep is horrible (and very noisy - can damage your hearing) however it can be reduced by reducing media-volume in settings but not directly inside app. vibration alert would be much much better...  app cannot be copied to SD-card, it copies itself into app-private which is strange - so beware!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App is useless
reviews.comment: A very nice looking app but is useless. You can\'t set the volume of the beap ton and you bearly hear when your minute is up. Please add more settings to the app
reviews.author: Slobodan Petrovi\304\207

reviews.title: Minute Saver
reviews.comment: This is excellent. It will save you money because it warns when 1 minute is about to expire and you can continue talking if you want or cut it off. Highly recommendable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inaccurate 5-6sects rong
reviews.comment: To loud call volume can damage hearing uninstalling
reviews.author: Tony Manchaca

reviews.comment: Great app, great communication with developers. Will add sound volume and duration control, and adjusable time too. 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Very good app. Should have a volume level control for the beep or even better, vibrate instead of ringing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Unistalling as the beep sound is hurting my ears. Will reinstall and give 5 stars if the beep sound can be controlled.
reviews.author: A Google User
